description: attach interface api depends on legacy network info which has been replaced to new network model.  so need update the usge of network info in attach interface api.
title: attach interface to instance fails due to legacy network info not updated to new network model

comments.content:
Looks like the regression was caused by https://review.openstack.org/38920

This relates to the https://blueprints.launchpad.net/nova/+spec/network-adapter-hotplug feature which was added in Grizzly
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~markmc
